description: "Nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDs) inhibit the cyclooxygenase isoenzymes COX1 and COX2 with varying degrees of specificity for the COX2 isoform. As a result, the conversion of arachidonic acid to prostaglandins (PGs) is inhibited. The main effects of PGs throughout the body are listed."  Inspired by Figure 1 in PMID:32322101.
title: NSAIDs mechanism of action
